lines.content: This is a project template for a greenfield Java project. It's named after the Java mascot _Duke_. Given below are instructions on how to use it.
Prerequisites: JDK 11, update Intellij to the most recent version.
1. Open Intellij (if you are not in the welcome screen, click `File` > `Close Project` to close the existing project first)
1. Open the project into Intellij as follows:
1. Select the project directory, and click `OK`.
1. If there are any further prompts, accept the defaults.
1. Configure the project to use **JDK 11** (not other versions) as explained in [here](https://www.jetbrains.com/help/idea/sdk.html#set-up-jdk).
In the same dialog, set the **Project language level** field to the `SDK default` option.

3. After that, locate the `src/main/java/Sana.java` file, right-click it, and choose `Run Sana.main()` (if the code editor is showing compile errors, try restarting the IDE). If the setup is correct, you should see something like the below as the output:
* This class represents the Deadline task
* @param isDone        if the deadline is done
public Deadline(String deadlineName, boolean isDone, String deadlineTime) {
* Returns a String representation of the Deadline
* Converts the strings in mem to a Deadline
* Converts Deadline into a string to be stored in mem
* @return string   string of deadline to be stored in mem
* Returns a string representation of the deadline time
* This class represents the Event task
* @param isDone    if the event is done
* @param eventTime the time of the event
public Event(String eventName, boolean isDone, String eventTime) {

* This class represents the exception thrown when the command give to Sana is incomplete
* The message Sana says when the message is incomplete
private static String message = "MATE, finish your sentence!";

System.out.println("I can't read the memory. Let's just start afresh!");
System.out.println("My memory was messed with while running, I'll reinitialise it :)");
* This class represents the exception thrown when the mark index provided to Sana is out of bounds
* The message Sana says when encountering this exception
private static String message = "Heyyy, I can't find this task..";

* taskMem stores the tasks given to Sana in a txt file

* @param taskIndex The index of the tast to be removed
private void delete(int taskIndex) throws OutOfBoundsTaskException {
